message.body: Hello again
Hi. Up for chat now?
Of course
Good:-) Where are you, btw? We've come off some miserable heat here.
Oakland, CA. You are in Philly right?
Yeah. I forget what we said before. I'll look at it.
Oh yeah. So what do you like to do?
Watch film, tv, read, run, bike, swim, hike, cook. What about you?
Walk, read (especially sf/ fantasy), listen to music, sing, write songs. The last two, especially folk songs and filk songs (=sf/fantasy fandom folk songs).
Do you play any instruments?
Guitar, a little. Not as much as I used to. I live to sing, though, and people tell me I have a good voice, so I guess they're right.
And you?
I am not at all musically gifted
What kind of film & TV do you enjoy?
Film noirs and drama on television
I like some noir, mostly classics like Bogie. Do you have any recommendations?
I just watched The Lady Eve which was good. I plan to watch The Bicycle Thief tonight. The Third Man is one of my favorites
oh yeah, 3rd Man, don't remember how long ago I saw that. Heard good stuff about TBT, nothing about TLE. What are they about?
Barbara Stanwyk and Henry Fonda. She is a con woman who falls for her mark.
Oh, sounds good. Can't beat those leads. And her falling for Henry Fonda is no stretch of the imagination. Maybe I'll look for it on Netflix or at the library.
It's on Netflix
My son just saw Pacific Rim with a friend last week. Then he went to it again last night w his sister who is home on vacation. He's so enthusiastic abou
t it, he says he'd gladly see it a third time w me, and the reviews & word of mouth i've heard are so good that I might. - Oh good.(Eve, Netflix)
What's pacific rim about?
So, maybe not to your taste, to any of your tastes. It's not in my usual line. But SON & DAUGHTER thought it great fun, so maybe I will take him up on it.
